user_stories.title: Developer sees workflow timing at completion
user_stories.i_want: to see a timing breakdown when my workflow completes
user_stories.so_that: I know which phases took the longest and whether the workflow stayed within budget

user_stories.title: Developer is warned when budget is exceeded
user_stories.i_want: to see a warning when the workflow exceeds its time budget
user_stories.so_that: I'm aware the workflow is slower than expected and can investigate

user_stories.title: Framework automatically reduces overhead when over budget
user_stories.as_a: developer whose workflow is running over budget
user_stories.i_want: the framework to automatically reduce debate rounds and fan-out parallelism
user_stories.so_that: subsequent phases complete faster without manual intervention

user_stories.title: Framework maintainer detects performance regressions
user_stories.i_want: each completed workflow to be compared against recent workflows of the same intensity
user_stories.so_that: I can detect when a code change has caused a performance regression

user_stories.title: Framework maintainer monitors hook dispatcher overhead
user_stories.i_want: each hook dispatcher to report its execution time
user_stories.so_that: I can identify which dispatchers are slowest and optimize them
